name: Charm Fish Hero - New Best Super Match 3 Kingdom
name_original: Charm Fish Hero - New Best Super Match 3 Kingdom
description:
Play Happy Fish - Deep Sea for free. This game is a fun match 3 casual puzzle!
New innovative Happy Fish - Deep Sea game comes!
Make matches of 3 or more fish, create blasts! Starts out simple, but things get more and more interesting and challenging.
Start your sweet journey in this puzzle adventure!

Features:
• Cute and shining fish, very cool!
• Multiple game goals
• Over 100 interesting levels
• Super bright graphics
• Create a high score with your friends.
